stimulusHtml: Quick-to-See Smith chose to use collaged materials from commercial products and popular culture both to highlight contemporary racial stereotypes and to

features.html: Courtesy of the Artist and the Accola Griefen Gallery, NY

choicesHtml: create patterns that imitated Native American beadwork
raise ecological awareness through the reuse of materials
challenge the gestural processes of mid-twentieth-century American abstractionists
demonstrate that Native American artists were engaged in contemporary art practice
